note: Organic soap or natural soap are soaps that do not contain any chemicals and are obtained by completely natural and organic methods.

name: Natural Soaps
value: Organic soap or natural soap are soaps that do not contain any chemicals and are obtained by completely natural and organic methods.

name: Natural oils
value: Natural oils, which have been used as raw materials in the cosmetic industry from past to present, are obtained from herbal extracts and have many benefits for the skin and hair.

name: Organic Soaps
value: SOAPs No perfume is used to scent organic soaps. They get the natural smell of organic substances in them.
